channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 13:33 Flow to the Zaporizhzhia Oblast. Follow the following messages.
item.description: 游릭 13:33 Flow to the Zaporizhzhia Oblast. Follow the following messages.#Zaporizhzhia_ This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 13:33 Flashing anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community- March Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivka Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 13:33 Flashing anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community- March Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivka Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
